commands.name: prettier
commands.summary: Used by the pre-commit Git hook. This command invokes Prettier to reformat staged changes.

commands.name: watch
commands.shellCommand: concurrently -k -n client,api,banner,banner-data "cd projects/client && npm run watch" "cd projects/api && npm run watch" "cd projects/banner && npm run watch" "cd projects/banner-data && npm run watch"

commands.name: start
commands.shellCommand: concurrently -k -n client,api,banner,banner-data "cd projects/client && npm run start" "cd projects/api && npm run start" "cd projects/banner && npm run start" "cd projects/banner-data && npm run start"

commands.name: dev:client
commands.summary: Watch client and run build version of other essential projects.
commands.shellCommand: concurrently -k -n client,api,banner "cd projects/client && npm run watch" "cd projects/api && npm run start" "cd projects/banner && npm run start"

commands.name: dev:api
commands.summary: Watch api and run build version of other essential projects.
commands.shellCommand: concurrently -k -n client,api,banner "cd projects/client && npm run start" "cd projects/api && npm run watch" "cd projects/banner && npm run start"

commands.name: dev:banner
commands.summary: Watch banner and run build version of other essential projects.
commands.shellCommand: concurrently -k -n client,api,banner "cd projects/client && npm run start" "cd projects/api && npm run start" "cd projects/banner && npm run watch"
